Nice Game

Je recommande fortement, c'est un jeu qui doit évoluer, et la communauté de même. Je m'amuse sur le jeu assez régulièrement !

Les bons points :

- Jouer seul en tant que tueur.
- Jouer à plusieurs en tant que survivant.
- On peut chill avec des amis en partie privée.
- Quand on comprend après quelques heures de jeu que le jeu ne tourne pas autour d'une partie de cache-cache mais bien autour d'une partie de chat et la souris, il prend tout son sens et nous ressentons une adrénaline unique pendant les poursuites.

Les mauvais points :

- La communauté très souvent toxique, que ce soit au niveau du chat de fin de partie ou dans leur manière de jouer.
- Il est difficile de jouer chill en tant que tueur, on est souvent forcés de tryhard un minimum car les joueurs sont très bons en tant que survivant en général. Et surtout en "red rank", les rangs les plus bas et donc les joueurs en général les plus forts.
- Le jeu demande beaucoup d'investissement pour s'en sortir.

For 20$ I can honestly tell you this game will be entertaining. 
When you get tired of playing killer you just switch roles and fight from the other side. Because of the matchmaking you will have to level up to 15 for the two perk slots, or have great luck with getting solid perks in the first few levels. After that the game opens back up to skill vs skill...
Unless someone is abusing infinite windows, harvester, fast locker switches....

With the devs releasing updates occasionally, I dont see this game leaving my desktop soon.
个人感觉还行。
南村群童欺我老无力。

The concept is unique and interesting, but the game doesn't seem ready--many join game failures, several games ended prematurely due to lag or multiple player disconnects, several games I was able to win due to the killer apparently being bugged--he was standing still and repeatedly swinging his weapon at a wall, while players went about repairing generators and escaping with impunity.  Lag is very dangerous in this game--as with most online fighting games--and ended up leaving me dead more than once.

BE WARNED, beyond the technical issues, the game itself is extremely graphic, gory, dark, and violent.  Some games give you a sense of horror through music and sound, but here you see your injured character, moaning and crawling, leaving a trail of blood, get picked up like a sack of potatoes and hung up on a meat hook.  It's pretty effective at creeping you (me) out.

The same people that don't recommend this game like no man's sky and Fallout 4

Can't recommend this game until they fix the matchmaking. If you queue solo it's fine most of the time, however, if you have a group of 2 or more then you can expect hitting the "Ready" button over, and over. When you do finally connect you will have a dice rolled for you either taking you back to the survivor screen, getting stuck in a load screen, or the killer bails and you go back to hitting that "Ready" button. It's truly something that completely sours the experience of the game because the actual gameplay is phenomenal.

If if wasn't for this insanely glaring issue I would pants down recommend this game to anyone who enjoys fun.



UPDATE: All of the above was true once, but has been (for the most part) sorted out. This game gets my full recommendation for purchase.
Dead By Daylight will literally kill you before dawn by having you wait all night to find a game....

Good game worth the price, even more so if you buy it on sale, here is a quick list of pros and cons.

Pros:
1. Good concept 

2. Graphics (Pretty looking game)

3. Great with friends

4. Teamwork based game

5. Fast past horror and fun

6. Lots of free DLC

7. Great cheap DLC (More Killers & Survivors)

8. Loads of maps

9. Loads of free survivors and killers



Cons:
1. No dedicated servers (Which means you connect to the killer which works in his/her's favor)

2.  Game is a grind fest (Takes way to long to level anyone up) 

3. Bad community (People troll so hard in games from hiding in a closet all game to running to you while being chased by killer on purpose to get you killed

4.One game mode

5. Horrible matchmaking (Level 1 can end up against a level 40)

I really want to like this game. It's such a fantastic idea and on the border of being great but it has just too many problems to recommend. If you're a low level killer, you'll be paired up with undoubtedly several high level survivors and chances are they will win with little to no effort. If you're a survivor, it'll take forever to find a match (if you even do) and then it's hit or miss on how well the game will perform which depends on the host's internet and the host seems to be the killer. Pretty massively-unbalanced gameplay, latency issues due to the lack of dedicated servers, clunky mechanics (which I can overlook on their own but in combination with latency problems they become pretty unbearable), poor optimization, and the few exploits in the game such as window spams make this game not worth my time. Maybe it'll be patched in the future and polished out to be fantastic but it just didn't there yet. Save your money for now and wait for improvement or another asymmetrical serial killer game. 

Update: So it's been a full year or so since I wrote this recommendation and I have to say the game has improved a ton. You can still be paired against a person with significantly better perks than you which sucks but the lag issue has been somewhat handled, glitches and other problems have been worked on substantially and there is a ton more content now in new killers, maps, and survivors. I recommend it whole-heartedly now but just keep in mind that it isn't a perfect experience.

oyun çok güzel 200 saate yakın oynamama rağmen hala ilk maçım gibi zevk almaktayım.şiddet ile tavsiyelerim çünkü aksiyon,korku,hayatta kalma ve çokoyunculu olması gerçekten güzel.işin en güzel kısmı oyunun uygun bir fiyatta olması.
hepinize tavsiye ederim oynayın oynatın eğlenin eğlendirin

tek tavsiyem arkanızı kollayın :)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ben M.Semih.A 11.09.2016

Şuandaki oyun sürümü:1.1.1

Oynama Saatim:370

İncelemem
----------------
Evet bu sürüm 1.1.1 arkadaşlar, yeni bi inceleme yapmak istedim(amaç size daha iyi bir yorum vermek).İlk olarak oyunu hala çok zevkle oynuyorum.Optimizasyon sorunu bence hafif olarak var.Yeni bir dlc çıkardılar (19 ağustos olması lazım).Bütün DBD oyuncuları bu Dlc'yi bekliyordu.Geldiği gün tabikide hemen indirmeye başladım.Neyse indi, girdim 2 yeni karakter gelmişti.Nea ve Nurse.Nea nın gelmesi bence güzel oldu %10,%12,%15(tier 1-tier 2-tier 3) olarak 8 metredeki ve sizin eşyanızın ömrünün gitmesini yavaşlatıyor veya uzatıyor.Nurse ise oyunun a**sını s***n bir karakter. + ları:teleport,Auto aim(efso auto aim var abi). - leri:blink hakkınız bitince yere bakıyor,oyun diğer karaterlere göre biraz daha karanlık(bence daha kötü şeyler olması lazım).Neyse oyun için yeni bilgiler vereyim.Şu aralar Trapper,Nurse moda.Ben ise en çok sevdiğim hillbilly yi oynuyorum.

karakterler için bilgi vermek de istiyorum.
------------------------------------------------------------
Dwight:En son zevk için kasabileceğiniz bir karakter

Meg:Kendisi sporcu olarak bilinen bir kızımız gerçekten iyi koşuyor.(3. olarak kasılabilir)

Claudette:Benim tavsiyem bu karakter ile kasılmaya başlayın.Self Heal(care) gerçekten işe yarıyor.

Jake:Son zamanlarda kimsenin s*kine gelmeyen bir perke sahip olan arkadaşımız yani saboteur(sabotaj) perkine sahip.(bence 2. olarak kasılabilir ve sabotaj perki gerekli)

Nea:Streetwise perki gerçekten hoşuma gitti.Sesi ise biraz erotik(bence).(4. olarak kasılabilir)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Evan(trapper):Tuzaklarınız ile bir kan şöleni yaratabilirsiniz(3. olarak kasılabilir)

The Wraith:Görünmez olup kimsenin iliği duymadan ayaklarına gidebilirsiniz.Flash'a karşı kin'i vardır dikkatli olun yaklaşırken yoksa yanarsınız :) (ilk olarak kasılabilir)

The Hillbilly:Testere ile oraya buraya koşar gibi geliyor.Aslında insanlara testere ile tek atan ve yetenek gerektiren bir karakterimiz kendisi.Tek sıkıntısı testere kullanırken bayağı zor(5. olarak kasılabilir)

The Nurse:Teleport olup autoaim ile gerçekten etrafta kan dökebilirsiniz.(2. olarak kasılabilir)

Okuyanlar veya bakanlar için çok müteşekkirim... Not:Yararlı olmadıysa özür diliyorum...)

Игра просто отличная, я по крайней мере таких игр давно не видел и когда узнал о ней не отрывался от нее и проиграл где то часов 100 за дней 5, так же всегда можно повеселиться с друзьями. Вообщем покупайте с друзьями, не пожалеете!!!!!!

Ein sehr gutes Spiel, mit einem spaßigen Gameplay, welches allerdings auch seine Fehler und Kanten beinhaltet. Das Spiel macht mir viel Spaß, aber es gibt hin und wieder kleine Spaßbremsen. Ein gutes Beispiel ist hierfür das Matchmaking. Wenn man alleine spielt, ist dies ein eher geringes Problem. Sobald man aber mit Freunden spielen möchte, treten erste Probleme auf. Bis man eine passende Lobby gefunden hat, vergehen oftmals 5-10 Minuten. Kann recht nervig sein, wenn das nach jeder Spielrunde passiert, zumal die Runden meist 8-12 Minuten gehen, aber das hängt natürlich immer davon ab, wie gut man selber ist, wie gut das Team insgesamt ist und wie gut der Killer ist. Es kommt auch manchmal vor, dass der Killer nicht verlieren kann und frustriert das Spiel einfach verlässt und die Runde damit beendet. Die Balance zwischen Killer und Survivor ist auch nicht die beste, aber es ist nicht wirklich unfair. Wenn man weiß, wie man als Killer zu spielen hat, dann sollte man es auch schaffen, die Überlebenden hinters Licht zu führen und zu überwältigen.
Was ich nicht wirklich verstehen kann, sind tatsächlich manche Spieler. Manche denken leider nur an sich. Es kam schon vermehrt dazu, dass ich Spieler gerettet habe, ich geschnappt worden bin und der gerettete Spieler macht sich einfach aus dem Staub und lässt mich sterben. Das frustriert oft und lässt einen tatsächlich darüber nachdenken, das gleiche ebenfalls mal zu tun. Dennoch gibt es genug Spieler, die als Team spielen und nicht Ihr eigenes Ding durchziehen.

Persönlich finde ich das Spiel gut gelungen, aber man merkt deutlich, dass noch einiges an Arbeit getan werden muss. Das Spiel macht Spaß, selbst wenn einiges nicht so gut durchdacht ist.

Das Spiel an sich macht extrem Spaß.
Das Jäger und Gejagter Thema ist sehr deutlich im Spiel vertreten und die Umsetzung des Horrors gefällt mir persönlich sehr.
einziges Manko sind ein paar vorkommende Bugs die ab und an das Spielvergnügen etwas bremsen können und dass viele Killer wenn sie einen erwischt und aufgehangen haben einem einfach vorm Gesicht stehen bleiben ohne sich auch nur einen Millimeter von der Stelle zu rühren.
Ansonsten wie gesagt ein echt spannendes und spaßiges Spiel das Potenzial hat viele viele Stunden zu belustigen.

in Schulnoten würd ich dem Spiel ne glatte 2 geben.

Игра, где застрявщие в лесу человечки пытаются выбраться оттуда. Игра, в которой высокий дяденька бегает за тобой по этому же лесу. Игра, в которой есть чёрные женщины. Игра, где эти чёрные прыгают через одно и то же окно. Игра, где люди не умирают от удара мачете в лицо, они умирают только на крюке(нет). Игра, где прикосновение людей заживляют твои раны. Игра, где хер убежишь от высоких дяденек.

update: I hate this game. I have a very unhealthy relationship with it and keep coming back only to find the most excruciatingly god awful matches. Words can not describe how unhealthy my relationship with this game is and how poor the balancing is. For the sake of your sanity please seek a different game.

DbD ещё сырая, но уже набрала не маленькую аудиторию. Общее представление об игре уже сложилось у многих, даже у тех кто в неё уже играл. Сейчас же я попытаюсь изменить отношение к игре в лючшую сторону или же наоборот, ухудшить. Ну начнем.

1. Что из себя представляет игра?
Это survival horror, маловато годноты такого жанра. В игре есть, если можно так сказать, противостояние маньяка и выживших. Цель выживших - завести все генераторы (количество которых зависит от количества игроков), после чего открыть ворота и убежать. А цель маньяка, как вы уже догадались, помешать выжившим это сделать, убив их всех. Есть несколько способов это сделать, а именно подвесить на крюк (после чего немного подождать, пока он умрет) или же оставить умирать на земле. В обоих случаях другие выжившие могут помочь бедняге, снять с крюка или поднять его. У каждого маньяка есть своя "супер способность", которая облегчает поимку жертв. В игре присутствует система прокачки персонажа. В общем задумка достаточно хорошая.

2. Графическая составляющая.
Графика не плохая, но и не топовая. Глаза не режет, гамма отлично подходить под стиль игры. Картинка выходит очень и очень приятная, атмосфера передается. В общем 9 мз 10.

3. Оптимизация.
В этом игра ещё не показала себя. Очень требовательная игра, от чего аудитория намного меньше, чем могла бы быть. При достаточно хорошом компуктере и на высоких настройках выдает 50-60 фпс. Достаточно хорошо, но не у всех такие ПК. В общем тянет только на 6-7 фпс из 10.

4. Баги.
Больная тема. То маньяк не может тебя поднять, когда ты лежишь (как и другие выжившие). То лобби не запускается. То персонажи растянуты за руки. То волосы не на своем месте. То заставка зависнет. Не так критично, не так сильно затрагивает баланс, иногда можно проорать. Только из-за смешных багов даю оценку повыше. 6-7 растянутых текстур из 10. 

5. Читы и анти-чит.
Читы, как я слышал есть, но их я не встречал. Может анти-чит не пускает, а может игроки очень порядочные. И это очень хорошо. 10 из 10.

6. Обновления.
Обновления есть, крутят там что то в балансе, добавляют маньяков. Разработка идет. Но игра сырая, нету чт ещё говорить.

7. Геймплей.
Понятный любому. Видишь генератор, нажал кнопку, чинишь, всё понятно и интересно. Однообразность есть, но думаю разрабы игру не закинут, так как задумка очень хорошая. 10 генераторов из 10.

А вот конец. Спасибо, что дочитали обзор до конца. Игра очень хорошая, но сырая. Особенно она классная, когда играешь компанией, чем я практически не насладился. Желаю игре удачи, у игры есть будущее, надеюсь не пропадет. Игру советую, каефная. Моя оценка этой игре - 9 из 10.

The only reason I am writing a review is out of frustration of an awesome game.

Really if it ran well it would be wonderful. It just does not. I feel like there is a lack of improvement.
The time I have spent with the game it has seemingly gotten worse.

When I began playing it took awhile to find a match but the match was good quality.

Now when you actually find a match, taking the longest it has ever taken, you either have a bot killer that stands there, someone disconnects automatically, the game will just randomly end from killer disconnecting, or it will be so laggy you ability to dodge the killer is eliminated. Playing as the killer has its challneges but is a bit better. 

Lag can still cause you to swing at a survivor one inch from your face and you completely miss.

I reccomend it if you want to play killer right now and when you find a good match its wonderful.

Overall I love this game but currenly it is frustratingly unplayable.
Игра стоит своих денег!
This game is pure awesome. Play as killer or and survivor. Both are equaly fun.
Bad game

Although the concept of the game is very thrilling and intense, the game has unforgivable flaws. Terrible matchmaking, horrendous community, overall an atrocious game with atrocious optimization. Whenever a generator is turned on the game lags like hell, whenever you get chased the game lags like hell, everywhere the game lags like hell. The game also makes my graphics cards fans run on full speed. The minute I get to the loading menu my graphics card fans become indescribably loud (note: this does not happen on any other game nor has it ever happened on any other game). Although my graphics card drivers are up to date, my graphics card does not comply with this game for some ludicrous reason. Don't buy this game at its current state, it's definitely not worth it.

Ein wirklich geniales Spiel, das stundenlangen Spielspaß bereitet. Die Bugs werden spürbar weniger und man merkt, dass die Entwickler das Feedback, das sie bekommen, umsetzen. Dringende Kaufempfehlung an alle, die etwas Geduld erübrigen können, wenn es wieder mal darum geht, eine Lobby zu füllen - für Ungeduldige hingegen eher nicht das Spiel der Wahl ;)

[h1]Dead by Daylight - Honest Review [/h1]

Get ready for a totaly new inovative asymetric gameplay that you never have experienced before and totaly not got ripped off of F13 the Game.
Feel the nostalgia of playing a late 1990s multiplayer game over your AOL modem while you hang around 10-20 minutes in the most crappy matchmaking that was ever created. Then prepare to feel it again as the killer who is automaticly the host tacticly decides to download 13GB of porn midgame so that you character glitches around the map like this was the secret "Paranormal Activity"-Feature. Then feel the pure happiness when you finaly find a Lobby that has a Killer with only a 200ms ping.
[b][u]Be a Survivor[/u][/b]
And pick your Character that is applicable caleld "victim" in this game and choose of a vast pool of perks that once were cool but totaly got nerfed to the ground like [list]
[*]Sprintburst: That lets you run faster than the killer for 3 seconds every 40 seconds (on max level)
[*]Selfheal: With which -surprise- you can heal yourself - at least as long the Killer doesnt have "nurses calling" and you have one minute time to do so.
[*]Sabotage: So that you can destroy one of the 20 hooks per map with the time expenses of repairing a generator, then get hit by the nurse who ported herself over the whole map in the time you needed to stand up. To finaly realise that you entirely wasted your time since every killer has Iron Grasp III
[*]Or whatever Dwight and that asian Chick are good for.[/list]
Then get in the Game to face terrifing Killers like [list]
[*]The Trapper: The most popular class amogst Killer players (since you need absolutely no skill to play him). Who places beartraps below any window, pallet and just everywhere as he has an almost unlimited supply of those and then just waits. - Until you stepped in one of those. Then he picks you up, hangs you on a hook lies a Trap down to your feed and jsut waits again. - Until one of your teammates is stupid enough to think that he can rescue you, puts you down of the hook, into the trap then runs away as the Trapper is right at you. Then you get hooked again, give the Killer double Bloodpoints and instantly die without getting struggle-points as your teammate waited jsut until you reach the 2nd stance on the hook.
[*]The Nurse: Who has a teleport that allows her to blink 3 times, through any objects and even without strengthen it with perks or addons already allows her to travel over half the map in less than 5 seconds. And the best of all - unless like in games like DotA, LoL, Evolve, Overwatch or any other somewhat balanced MP-Game her blink HAS - NO - COOLDOWN.
But you get one second in which she will look on the ground after blinking which should be absolutely more than enough time to jsut magicly disappear like Houdini. But 20 seconds CD on Megs Sprintburst were totaly OP - sure...
[*]Or the other two that are actualy somewhat balanced and therefore almsot never get played. [/list]
Then feel the fun and stress of the best delivered horror atmosphere in a multiplayer game ever. At least for the first 5 hours untill you realise that the best way to play this game as survivor is to be an antisocial, palletdropping, bodyblocking, genfokusing unaltrustic dick. Who has no respect from the killer, rescues his teammates only for the 1k altruism points even in the most inappropriate situations so that the killer gets that poor dude again and you can farm another 1k altruism points. Or just cpltly ignore any teamplay, and play the "Gen-Repair Simulator 2016", or just pick a map with the "track the killers belongings"-Addon and get your 5k in objectives by running through the world without doing anything productive. Or to make it short: Do anything but playing this game as it is supposed to be played.
So grab your friends to experience that one actualy good game per hour that certainly almost compensates the 4 camping Trapper rounds you had before but at the other hand gives you an upseting outlook of how awesome this game could have been if the Developers weren't so busy with sucking TrU3Ta1ent's cock. Or give it up and

[b][u]Be the Killer[/u][/b]
And learn the new definition of "Free Elo" as you get Bloodpoints for everything featuring: [list]
[*] Repeadiatly place and pick up a beartrap (as the Trapper)
[*] Spend 2 minutes chaseing a Survivor
[*] More than 1k Points at once for porting at a Survivor's position and hitting him right afterwards (as the nurse)
[*] 300 Points for Chainsawpsrinting through the map as Hill Billy (weeeeeee!)
Or my favorite
[*] 10-15k for picking Wraith, put a weight on your left mouskey and then just stand there AFK continously meeleattacking as the survivors will come and willingly throw themselves into your knive to farm altruism points on each other
[/list]
Get bored as you rush through the first 5-10 ranks in one single non-loosing streak without even leveling your killer until the Crappy matchmaking throws 4 rank one survivors in your rank 15 Lobby, who have a full set of pink perks and spent 150 hours with the game which finaly makes them able to compensate the mountain of advatages you get. Then spent those 200k BP you've earned until then to unlock a list of totaly broken perks like: [list]
[*] Iron Grasp - that makes the wiggling-mecanic and the sabotage perk useless as you are able to go on a sightseeing tour around the map before you hang your victim in the basement
[*] Noone escapes Death - that enables you to onehit everyone for 2 minutes after the exit gates are powered
[*] Insidious - which is both the proof the the devs regard hookcamping as legit and a big fat "fuck you!" in the face of every survivor who wants to help
or my favorite
[*] Combine "Deerstalker", "A Nurse's Calling", "Bloodhound"/"Stridor" and "Spies From The Shadows" - To see downed Survivors through walls and obstacles, to see survivors that heal or get healed through walls and obstacles, "to clearly see the bloodtracks of wounded people who are already on the other side of the map/clearly hear people breathing if you have soround sound and see survivours that startle the birds - or to make it short: Get a legal Wallhack in addition to the legal Noclip your nurse already has. Because you have no cheaters in a game that already offers players to cheat legaly. (Just kidding since this game is not VAC protected there is a quite big bunch of cheaters.)
[/list]
And if that is still not enough get some addons on your weapon to once and for all anihilate the last chunks of balance your class ability had or throw in a "memento mori" offering to instakill suvivors without even hooking them.
Then go to the forums and create salty posts about t-bagging and "infinite" abuseing survivors because you managed to get to rank 1 without notecing that all you need to do to counter those 4 infinite that are still in the game is to place a stupid trap right below that window/channel your chainsaw at the right time or simply play nurse whilst survivors have no way to counter your dickhead-camping strategy you can pull off at any hook on the map.

So be ready to play

"Camped 'till Daylight" - i mean "Gen repair sim" - i mean "Fuck you for picking survivor" i mean

Dead by Daylight.

Игра в принципе годная, но есть минусы:
1: Баги. Да, багов много, даже некоторые остались после выхода игры
2: Много вылетов. Может тебя неожиданно выкинуть или при подключение лоби может вылететь
3: Читеры (хотя мне попался только один, но это можно минусом и нельза назвать, так как пишет сообщение, что один чувак читер и выкидывает в главное меню)
Несмотря на среднее кол-во багов, игра напряжённая и интересная (немного страшная)
Оценка: 8 "Да что за нафиг, я же попал" из 10
Рекомендую эту игру
Дрисня, а не игра. Ужасно скучная дрисня, даже кс лучше...

Je pourrais faire l'étendue de tous les avantages que le jeu comprend comme le fait qu'il se révèle pas mal amusant et son ambiance a du charme, mais ils s'effacent complètement avec ses défauts. Matchmaking d'un autre âge, partie entre amis quasi miraculeuse, le rank bien plus difficile en survivant que killer ( étant donné que si les points survies ne sont pas au RDV il est quasi impossible de up ). Communauté inégale, parfois très collaboratrice et pis d'autres fois soliste.
Le jeu reste plus agréable en killer, le salon est créé, et les points défilent à partir du moment où on chasse ( et qu'on ne campe pas ).

เกมสนุก คอนเซปดีแต่การอัพเดทห่วยแตกมากๆ ไม่มีการแก้ไขใดๆทั้งสิ้น ทั้งเล่นกับเพื่อนที่ต้องหลุดมาชวนกันใหม่ทุกๆรอบ การปรับเซตติ้งเกมที่ทุเรศสุดๆ เท่าที่เคยเห็นมา ตัวเกมอุดมไปด้วยบัคนานาชนิดเท่าที่จะมีได้ ที่ส้นตีนสุดๆคือการใช้โปรเริ่มระบาดสุดๆ เล่นคนเดียวพอสนุกเล่นกับเพื่อนทีนะหาห้องนานสุดๆ เล่น 2-3 นาทีหาห้องเป็นชั่วโมง ความสมุดุลยังขาดๆเกินๆ บางสิ่งบางอย่างทางผู้พัฒนาควรจะแก้ได้แล้ว แต่นี่ปล่อยเรื้อรังมาก จริงๆเกมนี้มันดีสนุกตื่นเต้น แต่ผมจะไม่ให้+ ถ้าทางผู้พัฒนาไม่ใส่ใจปรับปรุงเรื่องน่ารำตาญพวกนี้ เมื่อคุณกดเกมนี้มาแรกๆจะสนุก หลังๆคุณจะเริ่มเบื่อมากๆเพราะบัค+หาห้องนานๆ เสียดายกดคืนเกมไม่ได้แล้ว ใครคิดจะซื้อ รอลดราคาหรือรอให้เกมเสร็จก่อนดีกว่าครับ เสียอารมสุดๆ
